bucketTitle: GRS 3.2 050 - Backups of Master Files and Databases, Permanent Master Files:
dispositionText: TEMPORARY: Destroy immediately after the identical records have been captured in a subsequent backup file or at any time after the transfer request has been signed by the National Archives, but longer retention is authorized if required for business use.

bucketTitle: GRS 3.2 051 - Backups of Master Files and Databases, Temporary Master Files:
dispositionText: TEMPORARY: Destroy immediately after the identical records have been deleted or replaced by a subsequent backup file, but longer retention is authorized if required for business use.

bucketTitle: GRS 5.8 - Technical and Administrative Help Desk Operational Records:
dispositionText: TEMPORARY: Destroy 1 year after resolved, or when no longer needed for buisness use, whichever is appropriate.
seriesTitle: INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY OPERATIONS AND MANAGEMENT RECORDS

bucketTitle: GRS 3.2 040 - System Backups and Tape Library Records, Incremental Backup Files:
dispositionText: TEMPORARY: Destroy when superseded by a full backup, or when no longer needed for system restoration, whichever is later.
seriesTitle: INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY OPERATIONS AND MANAGEMENT RECORDS

bucketTitle: GRS 3.2 041 - System Backups and Tape Library Records, Full Backup Files:
dispositionText: TEMPORARY: Destroy when second subsequent backup is verified as successful or when no longer needed for system restoration, whichever is later.
seriesTitle: INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY OPERATIONS AND MANAGEMENT RECORDS

bucketTitle: GRS 3.2 040 - System Backups and Tape Library Records, Incremental Backup Files:
dispositionText: TEMPORARY: Destroy when superseded by a full backup, or when no longer needed for system restoration, whichever is later.

bucketTitle: GRS 3.2 041 - System Backups and Tape Library Records, Full Backup Files:
dispositionText: TEMPORARY: Destroy when second subsequent backup is verified as successful or when no longer needed for system restoration, whichever is later.

bucketTitle: GRS 3.2 050 - Backups of Master Files and Databases, Permanent Master Files:
dispositionText: TEMPORARY: Destroy immediately after the identical records have been captured in a subsequent backup file or at any time after the transfer request has been signed by the National Archives, but longer retention is authorized if required for business use.

bucketTitle: GRS 3.2 051 - Backups of Master Files and Databases, Temporary Master Files:
dispositionText: TEMPORARY: Destroy immediately after the identical records have been deleted or replaced by a subsequent backup file, but longer retention is authorized if required for business use.
